A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Don't listen to the RT score. Obviously weighted. For example Black-ish has a 100% and a 48% public opinion. There's no way they have no critic that didn't like it. It's laughable.

Anyways this movie is pretty terrible. I'd give it a two but to make it climb down to the 25% it deserves\, I'll rate it a 1/5.

If anyone reads this\, just know this movie makes zero sense. I've never had a movie that's nearly 3 hours give absolutely nothing in return. We know even less than we did. It's just horrible.

If you want to know my thoughts\, please check out MauLer's videos on the movie. It's a perfect review of everything that makes this the absolute worst Star Wars film.
